manifest.ext.name: Numbers-LE
manifest.ext.description: Zero Hassle Number Extraction from JSON, YAML, CSV, TOML, INI, and .ENV
manifest.command.extract.title: Extract Numbers
manifest.command.dedupe.title: Deduplicate Numbers
manifest.command.sort.title: Sort Numbers
manifest.command.analyze.title: Analyze Numbers
manifest.command.settings.title: Open Settings
manifest.command.settings.export.title: Export Settings
manifest.command.help.title: Help & Troubleshooting
manifest.settings.title: Numbers-LE Settings
manifest.settings.copy.clipboard.desc: Automatically copy extraction results to the clipboard
manifest.settings.csv.streaming.desc: Stream CSV extraction incrementally into the editor
manifest.settings.dedupe.desc: Enable automatic deduplication of extracted numbers
manifest.settings.open.new-file.desc: Open post-processed content in a new editor
manifest.settings.open.side-by-side.desc: Open extraction results in a new editor to the side
manifest.settings.safety.enabled.desc: Enable safety checks for large files and operations
Warn when input file size exceeds this threshold in bytes
manifest.settings.safety.warn.large-outp: Warn before opening/copying when result lines exceed this threshold
manifest.settings.safety.warn.many-docum: Warn before opening multiple result documents when count exceeds this threshold
manifest.settings.parse-errors.desc: Show parse errors as VS Code notifications when parsing fails
manifest.settings.sort.enabled.desc: Enable automatic sorting of extracted numbers
manifest.settings.sort.mode.desc: Selects how results are sorted when sorting is enabled
manifest.settings.statusbar.enabled.desc: Show Numbers-LE status bar entry for quick access
manifest.settings.telemetry.desc: Enable local-only telemetry logs to the Output panel
manifest.settings.analysis.enabled.desc: Enable automatic analysis of extracted numbers
